title: Moderate: prometheus-jmx-exporter security update
description:
Prometheus JMX Exporter is a JMX to Prometheus exporter: a collector that can be configured to scrape and expose MBeans of a JMX target.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-25857 is retrieved from Red Hat
